definitions.text: your basis for belief or disbelief; knowledge on which to base belief
examples: the evidence that smoking causes lung cancer is very compelling

definitions.text: an indication that makes something evident
examples: his trembling was evidence of his fear

definitions.text: (law) all the means by which any alleged matter of fact whose truth is investigated at judicial trial is established or disproved
provide evidence for; stand as proof of; show by one's behavior, attitude, or external attributes
examples: His high fever attested to his illness
The buildings in Rome manifest a high level of architectural sophistication
This decision demonstrates his sense of fairness
The blood test showed that he was the father
Her behavior testified to her incompetence
he was telling on all his former colleague
